title: Establishment of a fully equipped Haemodialysis Unit and Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) Clinic with NCD Screening facility at Colombo East Base Hospital, Mulleriyawa
decision_details: - Colombo East Base Hospital located at Mulleriyawa provides secondary healthcare facilities to a large number of people in Colombo district and the Hospital, at present, offers all major specialist consultation services in the fields of medicine, surgery, gynecology and obstetrics and pediatrics. Further, under the ongoing projects, it has been planned to establish new units of National Stroke Centre, Level 2 Accident and Emergency Unit, Intensive Care Unit (ICU), Neo-natal Intensive Care Unit (NICU) and Simulation Centre for this Hospital. In addition, it has been proposed to establish a dialysis unit with 12 dialysis machines and a fully equipped Haemodialysis Unit with necessary surgical equipment which can cater to 20 patients per day and a CKD clinic with Non Communicable Disease (NCD) screening facility, using a grant provided by the District 306 C1 of International Lions Clubs. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Health to enter into a Memorandum of Understanding between the Ministry of Health and the District 306 C1 of International Lions Club for the implementation of the said project, was approved by the Cabinet.
